item.title: American Airlines saying goodbye to Barclays: Citi to be exclusive card partner
item.description: Barclays has ended applications for the American Airlines Aviator card portfolio, and Aviator cardholders will be transitioned to Citi next year.

item.title: Hilton Honors Amex Business card review: Elite perks on a budget

item.title: What are points and miles worth? TPG’s October 2025 monthly valuations
item.description: Learn how points and miles from major loyalty programs stack up. Here's how TPG values each major credit card, hotel and airline rewards currency.

item.title: The best credit cards for Walmart shopping
item.description: Are you a frequent Walmart shopper? If you have one of these credit cards, you should be shopping at Walmart right now — here's why.

item.title: Southwest Airlines adds Alaska flights amid 2025 expansion spree
item.description: Southwest Airlines will land in Anchorage, Alaska, in 2026 amid a spurt of new growth.
